name: Mini Minions
description:
How long can you survive the onslaught of endless enemies marching towards your kingdom?  Build outposts and send troops to battle in one of my first projects ever.  I had a ton of fun making this and--while not perfect--it taught me a lot about programming.

All art and assets were created by me.

Controls:

  • Camera - WASD
  • Zoom - Mouse Wheel
  • 1234.. - Unit Quick Buy
  • Select - Left Mouse Button
